SEARCH
Package org.apache.velocity.runtime

Interface DeprecatedRuntimeConstants

All Known Subinterfaces:
RuntimeConstants
All Known Implementing Classes:
RuntimeInstance, RuntimeSingleton, Velocity, VelocityEngine
@Deprecated public interface DeprecatedRuntimeConstants
Deprecated.
This class gathers deprecated runtime constants
Version:
$$
Author:
Claude Brisson

    • OLD_CHECK_EMPTY_OBJECTS

    • OLD_ERRORMSG_START

      static final String OLD_ERRORMSG_START
      Deprecated.
      see RuntimeConstants.ERRORMSG_START
      Starting tag for error messages triggered by passing a parameter not allowed in the #include directive. Only string literals, and references are allowed.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      static final String OLD_ERRORMSG_END
      Deprecated.
      see RuntimeConstants.ERRORMSG_END
      Ending tag for error messages triggered by passing a parameter not allowed in the #include directive. Only string literals, and references are allowed.
      See Also:

    • OLD_RESOURCE_LOADERS

      static final String OLD_RESOURCE_LOADERS
      Deprecated.
      see RuntimeConstants.RESOURCE_LOADERS
      Key used to retrieve the names of the resource loaders to be used. In a properties file they may appear as the following:

      resource.loader = file,classpath

    • OLD_VM_ENABLE_BC_MODE

      static final String OLD_VM_ENABLE_BC_MODE
      Deprecated.
      When displaying null or invalid non-quiet references, use the argument literal reference instead of the one in the macro block. Defaults to false.
      Since:
      2.1
      See Also:
